QuestionTxt: Do you think health care costs nationally are rising faster than the overall rate of inflation, slower than the overall rate of inflation, or at about the same rate?
SurveySponsor: Henry J. Kaiser Family Foundation, Harvard School of Public Health
SourceDoc: Kaiser/Harvard The Public's Health Care Agenda for the 112th Congress Survey
StudyNote: 1000 respondents were interviewed on landline telephones, and 502 were interviewed on cell phones, including 203 who had no landline telephone.
